attributes.action: CEASE GIVING WELFARE BENEFITS TO FORIEGN PEOPLE WHO HAVE RESIDED IN THE COUNTRY FOR LESS THAN 3 YEARS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you sick of foriegn people getting more money than you (whilst twiddling their thumbs at home) or whilst working TAX FREE on the side, whilst us hard working tax payers foot the bill.  Well if you are please sign this petition.  I think that all foriegn people should have to support themselves for at least three years (paying their taxes and respecting the British way of life) before even being considered for welfare benefits.  From an Irish citizen living in Britian and respecting the laws of the land and paying her taxes!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
